localised_text.tooltip_text: [[col:red]]You must enter a game name that doesn't contain profanity before you can host the game[[/col]]

beta_tag.componentleveltooltip: The BETA label means we still have some work to do, so its not the finished article. Theres plenty to enjoy, with empires to raise, battles to fight, alliances to forge and enemies to conquer, but we also have a number of bugs to fix, balance-passes to do, and content/systems to improve.
